profile.intro: My name is Héloïse de Villepin and I created Villepin IT in 2022 as an independent full-stack developer. I live near Strasbourg, France, in the heart of the beautiful Alsace, and I consider a coffee latte to be essential for a good day.
profile.passions: Outside of programming, I am passionate about cultures, arts and personal development. At the moment, I am learning German and Spanish by myself, painting with acrylics and never miss an opportunity to discuss how to become a better human being.
profile.values: Having grown up in Burkina Faso, benevolence and solidarity are rooted in the values I wish to share through my work and my daily actions.

contact.title: Let's keep in touch!
contact.available: I am available to discuss about your project!
contact.notAvailable: I am not available right now for a new opportunity.
